content: i saw a cute zombie bear but trying the pattern webpage multiple times i only ever got an error page not found so what do you do when you really wanted to make it create your own pattern of course i wanted to share it for free with anyone else that has a love of odd things lol gauge is not important materials needed 4 5mm hook 3 5mm hook scissors stitch marker yarn needle fiber fill 1 safety eye worsted weight yarn - 2 shades of green or whatever color you choose red & small amounts of black light pink & gray or white the entire bear takes less than one full skein of rhss in the main body color worked in the round with the exception of the brain 4 5mm hook for everything except the heart & brain pattern not tested so please contact me if you think there may be a typo in the pattern i discovered an error in the original pdf i have corrected it and updated the pdf download
